mil7.2.4:1.2_1: dīpinī sakiṁyeva gabbhaṁ gaṇhāti, na punappunaṁ purisaṁ upeti?
mil7.2.4:1.3_1: yoginā yogāvacarena āyatiṁ paṭisandhiṁ uppattiṁ gabbhaseyyaṁ cutiṁ bhedaṁ khayaṁ vināsaṁ saṁsārabhayaṁ duggatiṁ visamaṁ sampīḷitaṁ disvā ‘punabbhave nappaṭisandahissāmī’ti yoniso manasikāro karaṇīyo.
mil7.2.4:1.4_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, dīpiniyā ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
